caption.title: Clusters identified for optimally scaled valuations.
caption.p: 54 end values were selected by the respondents among 57 predefined end values ( S3 Table) across 200 runs. Numbers 1 to 6 refer to value clusters 1 = "Focus on the local community", 2 = "Aesthetics", 3 = "Personal economy", 4 = "The place as such", 5 = "Active and conscious lifestyle choices", and 6 = "Nature and health" (see S2 Table).
Click here for additional data file.
